title: Mushroom and Tomato Soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '325g tomatoes, chopped', '160g fresh mushrooms, halved', '20g dried bean thread vermicelli, soaked and cut into 10cm lengths', '6 green beans, topped, tailed and cut into 3cm lengths', '2 slices ginger, lightly crushed', '2 limes, juiced', '1 big bowl water', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground pepper']
